bug.author: edgarriba
bug.description:
As discussed and proved in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/kornia/kornia/issues/157>#157</denchmark-link> we need to:
Replace in documentation dst_homo_src -> src_homo_dst. 1.1 Add integration test for 1) - probably the code I shared in #157 Call kornia.normalize_pixel_coordinates in here when normalized_coordinates is set to true. 2.1 Add a unit test show normalized vs pix coords.
